name: KurtzPel - Vanguard Combat Weapon Set
detailed_description:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.

Weapon sets for Vanguards charging at the forefront of battle. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma.

Included Costume: Look the part soldier! 'Vanguard weapon Set'

- Vanguard Great Sword x 1
- Vanguard Longbow x 1
- Vanguard Staff x 1
- Vanguard Gauntlet x 1
about_the_game:

short_description: ※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable. Weapon sets for Vanguards charging at the forefront of battle. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"
